page.title: 01Newtown
page.content: Newtown is an attractive,busy market town in the heart of the countryside of Mid Wales.It is within easy reach of the Welsh Coast and the Midlands. The Aberystwyth to Shrewsbury railway line passes through the town. The town is the headquarters of the Development Board for Rural Wales.The body has been responsible for the development of factories,modern housing and recreational facilities.Newtown has six primary schools, one secondary school and one special school.A new College of Further Education is siuated on the outskirts. The shopping area and offices are located in the town centre and these include branches of well known multipules such as W.H.Smith,Boots and Woolworth.The town has strong links with agriculture which is the main industry in the surrounding area.
